forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 54. South wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. South wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As afternoon settles over Boston, the skyline is draped in a soft, gray shroud that hints at a quiet, muted kind of beauty. The air, still and cool, cradles temperatures near fifty-four degrees, a reminder that autumn’s breath lingers, urging travelers to embrace their sweaters. A gentle south wind stirs, reminiscent of brisk walks along shaded streets, where fallen leaves crunch beneath footfalls, painting a crisp soundtrack to the slow unraveling of the day.

Tonight, the clouds will continue to accompany us, offering a warm embrace with lows dipping to forty-six. The veil of darkness will not reveal much beyond the muted silhouettes of trees and rooftops, but the ambiance remains cozy, perfect for reconnecting with a favorite book or crafting a comforting meal. Soft layers made of wool or cotton will keep out the evening chill, making time spent outdoors—perhaps at a local café sipping a warm beverage—quite delightful. As the day fades softly, it calls for pleasant activities that blend the simple joys of life with the tranquil mood of this overcast, yet inviting, November day.
